text:
@senatemajldr You misspoke or should I just say lying.

First, it's gop/wh who are trying to ram funding for trumps wish list over the American people's need because of COVID19. 

Second, tax cuts for the rich are owned by gop.
America has not forgotten #GOPTaxScam.
